info.title: Singapur Payment Server
info.description:
This microservice deals with common methods in relation to the payment  operations. 
 Url Confluence https://steps.everis.com/confluence/display/PROLEMER/Microservice+Payment

get.summary: Update the status of paycomet operations

200.description: A list of operations is returned

post.summary: SEPA execution is execution on a professional

get.summary: Payment rejection records are obtained from your payment identifier
This method retrieve information of operation by operationId
Retrieves Payment by ID and name and status
This method retrieve information of operation by operationId
Functionality that will retrieve depending on a transaction identifier if we have a payment registered in our database.
Retrieve the payment block record related to a transaction and a payment concept

200.description: The transaction was successful for the PaymentBlock entity query.

delete.summary: Delete the payment block record related to a transaction and a payment concept

200.description: The transaction was successful for the PaymentBlock entity elimination.

post.summary: The transaction was successful for the PaymentBlock entity registration

201.description: The entity has been successfully registered

200.description: The transaction was successful for the PaymentBlock entity registration.

post.summary: Entity that will have the payment gateway transaction data cross-referenced with its respective transaction

get.summary: Retrieve Paycomet Operation by dates for Batch Process Error Payments

post.summary: Retrieve operations from Paycomet with filters

get.summary: Functionality that will retrieve the professional's documents information from Paycomet
Define the request used to get data from Paycomet

post.summary: The refunds are created according to the payments made. The refund of money and update of data in the operation is generated

professionalEmail.description: Professional email related to Sepa operation

TransferBlockRest.description: Rest with the properties for transfer

statusCode.description: result of the payment action, it can return success or error depending if the payment has been processed

currency.description: currency that is used in the refund

refundType.description: type of the refund (total or partial)

startEndTime.description: Start of range for date filter

endEndTime.description: End of range for date filter

existsTotalPaid.description: Apply the filter of total paid greater than 0

nameProfessional.description: Name of the professional of the operation

lastNameProfessional.description: Last name of the professional of the operation

emailProfessional.description: Email of the professional of the operation

startTimeRange.description: Start of range for date filter

endTimeRange.description: End of range for date filter

transactionType.description: indicates the transaction type of the payment

tokenUser.description: Token associated with the payment transaction

reference.description: indicates the reference of the payment (unique Id por this payment)

signature.description: digital signature required for the payment

response.description: After a payment has been processed, information about that payment is return to the user.

accountCode.description: Six digit number used to classify transactions

authCode.description: Bank authentication code for the transactions

reference.description: Shows the payment reference of the transaction

id.description: Id,  internal identifier for the store

leroyId.description: Leroy Id,  internal identifier provided by Leroy Merlin

reference.description: Payment reference number of the Singapur platform

clientStatus.description: result of the payment action, it can return success or error depending if the payment has been processed

iframeUrl.description: URL that shows the ApyComet’s frame
